CustomField.description: Flags referrals created in last 24-72 hrs (excluding weekends)
CustomField.formula: IF(WEEKDAY( TODAY() ) == 5 || WEEKDAY( TODAY() ) == 6, AND(CreatedDate <= NOW() - 1 , CreatedDate >= NOW() - 3), AND(CreatedDate <= NOW() - 1 , CreatedDate >= NOW() - 5))
CustomField.label: Created in Last 3 Business Days
